website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an inexpensive slackline set that has everything you need and then some, this is a great option.
pros: With a 52-foot slackline, excellent carrying case, tree protectors, a help line, a ratchet cover, and a few other accessories, it’s hard to find a better value than this set offers
Customers love how easy this slackline is to set up and how efficient and sturdy the ratchet is
The ratchet cover helps to reduce the chances of injury
cons: Packaging can be an issue with this seller sometimes

customer_reviews.title: The greatest outdoor party prop, but you still have to practice
customer_reviews.text: My son considers this the best outdoor party prop. In fact, when he set it up in the front yard, with a safety/training line above it, he got all the neighborhood kids and teens stopping by. It does take two trees, one at each end, that are "at least 12" diameter.) To be sure, a hardwood could be thinner. I like the attention to detail, like a wrap around the tree that avoids injuring the tree, and a ratcheting tensioner that allows you to get the tension you need in the "slack" line. My biggest complaint is that I can't stay on the line anywhere near as well as my kids, but then they are in their 30s now.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Spinella

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up.  Comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: I've been slacklining for a long time. I used to use 1in tubular nylon webbing and a bunch of carabineers to do a primative setup, but this required a group of people to pull hard to get the line tight enough. Nowadays, it is difficult to find a group of people, as we are still older. I bought this kit so that I could easily set up by myself. It works extremely well, and only takes a few minutes, and a few clicks of the ratchet. It comes with a nice compact carrying bag, as well as tree protectors. I would highly recommend this for experienced slackliners as well as beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Good product but you may not get what youre supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: As a number of other reviewers experienced, I bought Deluxe and was sent Standard. Amazon took care of us but it's annoying. The MFGs bar code said deluxe so they clearly have trouble keeping their inventory straight. Would have liked the extra pieces, particularly the ratchet protector. Seems well constructed and we opted not to return it. Setup was easy and I would imagine that it'll give us years of camping fun.
customer_reviews.author: ElectroFreak

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lot of fun for my family since stringing it up. The quality is there, I would pay as much or more for a tow strap of the same size. This also comes with a training strap , protectors and a bag. Everyone that sees it has to try it out. Good for a laugh too.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Zero Gravity Slackline, its fun in a bag
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun using the zero gravity slackline kit. It is very easy and simple to set up which is great because my boys can set it up on their own. My kids set it up in the front yard and within minutes several of the neighbors were over wanting to try it. I appreciated that a bag was included as now I have a place to store it and its easy to transport. The bag was even big enough for me to throw in some granola bars for the park. I love too that this company donates 10% of their profits to charity. I would highly recommend the zero gravity slackline!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great slack line kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. I love the design, a very nice visible green. It's long enough for the trees I use. The ratchet is heavy duty and I don't feel like it's going to break or warp with use. I was a little unsure of the tree protection but I have been pleased and found that it did protect the bark and didn't dig into the tree. I love that the case is heavy duty and a little larger than the slack line. I can add items or gloves to it and still have plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: RRLiffe

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable, a big hit for kids and full grown adults alike.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, quality materials and durable. We set this up for some friends at a gathering in the park. Some of the men were nervous to give it a try for fear it would break under their weight (230 lb +). The slackline held up just fine and was a big hit at the event, for adults and kids alike.
customer_reviews.author: karen ogden

customer_reviews.title: Inspect the webbing and stitching
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to inspect before and after each use! When purchased the stitching wasn’t imbedded into the webbing as tight as it should have been and after being used for a kids fun run I noticed this. This was used as intended and not over tensioned.
customer_reviews.author: Aj W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This slack line is great! It was easy to put up and we had a lot of fun trying to get better at it! The instructions are pretty simple and we probably complicated things more than we needed to. If you’re looking for a good quality skackline for a good price, this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Stofela

customer_reviews.title: so much fun
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been having so much fun with this. Everyone wanted a turn after Christmas. My only comment is a separate slower video on just the ratchet would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerh

customer_reviews.title: SOLID QUALITY! TONS OF FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Tons of fun and solid quality. Comes WITH the tree protectors which is a definite bonus. I would recommend getting two if you're getting started. Use one for your feet, and the other for your hands. Then try to go further and further without using hands. Then one day you can be a professional slack liner like me. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Walters

customer_reviews.title: Fun, well made slack line.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun way to work on balance. My kids thought it was fun and it is made well. I am going to use it for a big event and I am sure all the kids will love it. Amazon shipped the wrong product as they got the inventory mixed up but replacement parts were sent. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: yanmackay

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: It shipped and delivered pretty quick! The first thing I noticed is the quality of the slack line. The ratchet is the main thing I was happy with; easy to use, plenty of leverage to help ease the tightening of the slack, and feels durable. It came with a training line which helps a ton for those friends or family that may not have great balance. The bag it comes with fits everything well. Overall very happy with purchase and I look forward to using it this month in Cancun!
customer_reviews.author: Scoobydrew

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: The ratchet doesn’t open enough to release the tension to undo it once you’ve got it tight. The slack line itself is thinner than most I’ve seen as well. Would not recommend. Of course I gave it as a gift in February and now can’t return it 🤦🏼‍♂️ There’s better sets out there or just go to the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Bry-guy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of fun this weekend using our Zero Gravity Slackline! I love that it comes in a carrying case and it has everything you need to get started right away. It was very easy to set up. It was great for me as an intermediate slacker and my wife as a beginner. The color even matched my Jeep. I would definitely recommend this product, and I'm excited to use it on more trips in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations! It's obvious this kit is built to last. The bag is roomy and durable, the slackline is high-quality, and the ratchet is smooth and easy to tighten, making set up a breeze. Already a favorite to take camping with the family, and it will be a staple of our family outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: bkdickman

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier with Zero Gravity Slackline
customer_reviews.text: Slacklines seem to have become pretty popular in my local area park. I always thought it would be really fun for friends and family. After reading reviews of the Zero Gravity slackline I decided to purchase it. I also loved the bag it came it to make transportation easy. I am so glad I went with this one. The quality of the line and tension mechanism is great. I hear the larger lines are easier to walk on which also helped me decide on this on. The two piece tension mechanism seems way better than some of the others I have seen. We are planning to go camping this weekend and I cannot wait to let my family use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, very durable, better than flybold IMO
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with the quality and durability. Have been using it for several months and seems well made. Love the storage bag...Way better than a box that is too small. My friend has the Flybold, but this one is better quality all around. Great for beginners. Our other friend saw both of them at the park and ordered her family a zero gravity. Great company. They should make more stuff. Top quality gear.
customer_reviews.author: Marci Warner

customer_reviews.title: High quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I grew up slacklining and my family went through so many growing up. Now that im married and starting to buy fun toys for our family I wanted higher quality that would last and was easier to use. This has been SO perfect. Beyond my expectation. My siblings have since bought this same one for their families since seeing mine. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quailty slackline. The ratchet is sturdy and I love the pieces that go around the tree to protect the tree and your slack line! Buy this is you’re wanting a slackline start up kit!!! The bag it goes in is a great add on feature for storage and protection while not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Karma Gawd

customer_reviews.title: I saw this on Instagram and thought it look like something fun to try
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on Instagram and thought it look like something fun to try, so I ordered it. The product comes exactly as described and is super easy to get set up. Unless you're like me and feel compelled to make it much harder than it actually is. Just read the instructions and don't try to ad lib. I can't wait to get in more practice so I can balance longer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crippen

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a good first line
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a good first line. I'm not good enough to say if it's good for more experienced people, but it's getting me there. I've had anywhere from 120# people to 210# on it with no issues. The carry bag is also really nice.
customer_reviews.author: KyleLLeonard

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's decent. But it certainly isn't a really well-designed Slack line
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, have used it several times since purchasing and never had an issue, would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous. Poor quality balance strap. Broke within two days of owning.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything to start off the slackline experience right.
customer_reviews.text: The equipment is pretty high quality and the instructions were very clear for setup. I will have to update this after testing it out a few more times. It's great to have a zipper sealed bag to organize the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't post reviews unless I really hate a product to make sure nobody makes the same mistake I do but this Slackline kit was such a pleasant surprise I had to let everyone know this is a top quality product! We've owned ours for over a month now - from the heavy duty bag to the heavy duty ratchet - love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Really fun to use and I can't wait until I get ...
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to use and I can't wait until I get really good at it! It's a little hard to do at first, but with some practice it will get easier. The instructions included were a little bit confusing to understand, but there are plenty of helpful videos on youtube. I definitely recommend searching those up!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Quality slackline
customer_reviews.text: The slackline was delivered very quickly without any problems. It comes with a carrying case which makes it easy to keep everything together and with enough room to fit without needing to recoil the slackline. I like the reinforced loops at the ends of the slackline and the sturdy come along. At a recent party the kids and adults were lining up to give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Solid aside from fraying...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old. She loves it. Easy to set up. Only downside so far is the frayed strap out of the box. (See picture) I would imagine this will lead to an earlier than usual. A lot of plant dried plant material gets stuck in the loose threads.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not a better slackline out there
customer_reviews.text: I've been using slacklines on and off for years and this slackline holds up with the best of them. Comes with everything you'd expect of a high quality line, but at 1/2 the cost! I'm excited to take this camping and try some higher altitude setups. The length is great for most park and camping setups, comes with 2 tree protection straps, the color is vibrant, and the ratchet holds tight for a good time. Highly recommended. See attached photos.
customer_reviews.author: Korinne Harper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - Will Not Disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: The Zero Gravity Slackline is a very high quality product. It's built to last, tons of fun and tree friendly too. Highly recommneded!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Fun. Great ab workout. Long learning curve - it's satisfying to get a few steps but takes a lot of work to master.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Enge

customer_reviews.title: ... the Zero Gravity slackline and I have not been disappointed at all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Zero Gravity slackline and I have not been disappointed at all! Awesome green color, easy to use, step by step instructions, and a nice carrying case. Highly recommend purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Knighton

customer_reviews.title: Great slackline
customer_reviews.text: We love our slackline the kids have been playing on it for hours without any issues. We love how high quality it is.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Linscomb

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and superior product.
customer_reviews.text: Great value!! So excited to give this to my son for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Winegar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value for and a great pastime... Purchased as a Christmas present. Shipping was fast with no problems. Thx!
customer_reviews.author: Eric L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the Whole Family!
customer_reviews.text: We got this slackline about a week ago and we love it! My kids love to try to balance on it and it gets them outside every day. All of us are learning how to balance on the slackline slowly but it is so much fun, even when we fall. :) The setup was fairly easy and take down is even easier! Love this product! Thank you Zero Gravity for making Slackers out of us!!!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wouden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slackline
customer_reviews.text: Awesome slackline! Came Nicely packaged. And easy to set up. My family really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli

customer_reviews.title: Overall great slackline. Had my only complaint was that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall great slackline. Had my only complaint was that the directions were not very clear on how to use the ratchet, but I eventually figured it out. Otherwise quality product!
customer_reviews.author: PDGA1

customer_reviews.title: I want to give this 1 star because I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 1 star because I can't figure out how to stay up on it, but that's not the products fault.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great slackline. Family is new new to slacklining, and we love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Does not include everything pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I only received the slackline and tree wraps. I did not receive what was described in the pictures. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Slackline! I have a few and this one ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Slackline! I have a few and this one is great for anyone looking to get into the sport. The bag and tree liners are an awesome benefit and super helper for any slackline setup. It
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Santore

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf Slackline
customer_reviews.text: This slack line is extremely well built and will really withstand some serious abuse. Looks like this company has thought through their design with great attention to details needed to make a quality product. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression!
customer_reviews.text: I like it! No stretch in the webbing made it easy to set up at the right tension/height. No complaints at all. The only reason I didn't give five stars is that I just got it, so haven't had a chance to evaluate durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hoag

customer_reviews.title: What a great family fun product
customer_reviews.text: What a great family fun product! The slackline was easy to setup and we all had a great time learning a new skill! Everything was easy to understand for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Jen and Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good price, I like the color, I haven't had any issues. I like that it comes with a bag and tree covers.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Falls

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: A perfect gift idea! We bought this for my nephews birthday. He was thrilled. He and his friends have been playing with the Slackline all week. It’s easy to set up and seems built to last. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tamuna k.

customer_reviews.title: Zippered storage bag a plus!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and take down. Strong sturdy straps and easy to use ratchet. I find the zippered bag extra convenient with an easy-grab handle a big plus for carrying. It has room to store additional gear.
customer_reviews.author: THS

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slack line for an outdoor activity to enjoy with my family. The product is high quality, easy to use, and most importantly fun. This will easily be one of our favorite activities as the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G Wilding

customer_reviews.title: Strong and tight
customer_reviews.text: Ratchet is easy to use and very strong. Fun for the whole family kids 8 to 19. We love it! Only negative is that it won’t work around really big trees but that’s not a real problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: This slackline is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This slackline is awesome! Installed within minutes and the kids love it. Great quality and it packs away in the case well.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: I love the reusable bag
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast. Packaging was very clean. I love the reusable bag, it has plenty of room! Kids had a great time and it holds up awesome. Set up and take down was a breeze. 12 year old kids had no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Fast and easy set up and take ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Fast and easy set up and take down, durable webbing, strong ratchet and a great bag for carrying it all. After using it three times I'm starting to be a real slacker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built to last, great carry/storage bag with everything you need, easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter could not get enough of the challenge to walk on the slackline which I bought for a family outing. This photo captured her progress after 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Moore

customer_reviews.title: Super easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest and fastest slack line set up ever. Easy to get the tension I want. I like the bag too, I just keep it in my car ready to go. Perfect for someone just getting into slack lining.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great slackline at an equally great price, with a storage bag!
customer_reviews.text: Most things that are high quality reflect in the price, but with this slackline you get a high quality product at an excellent price point. I’m excited to have this to bring along on all our adventures in it’s included storage bag!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Arthur Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great first slack line!
customer_reviews.text: Great first slack line! It is super easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: What I love the most is how wide this strap is
customer_reviews.text: What I love the most is how wide this strap is! I hate having a slack that is too thin for my feet and this is perfect for me in learning the wonderful skill. I love it and got exactly what I was hoping for from it!
customer_reviews.author: Parker Evans

customer_reviews.title: and the hinge just was crap. I have since ordered another product and tossed ...
customer_reviews.text: Found this product to be less than advertised. While it looked and felt of "high quality" the strap began to fray after just two very minimal uses. and the hinge just was crap. I have since ordered another product and tossed this one. Maybe I just got a bad batch and the majority of their products are great quality but this one I received was far less than average. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Owens

customer_reviews.title: Quality and color!
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality than expected for the price. Love the neon green color
customer_reviews.author: Davis Reid

product_meta.title: Zero Gravity Slacklines Slackline Kit with Industry Leading Carry/Storage Bag, Upgraded Ratchet w/Molded Finger Grip & Smooth Operation + Tree Protectors; Great Set for Kids, in All respects
feature_bullets: Slackline Kit with Industry Leading Carry Bag, Upgraded Ratchet w/ Molded Finger Grip & Smooth Operation + Tree Protectors; Great set for kids, Superior Quality in All Respects
